value.summary: The JSON outputs accurately reflect the report’s study design (JWST/MIRI phase-curve spectroscopy), the key quantitative findings (dayside brightness temperature 342 ± 22 K; epsilon 0.19 +0.23/-0.14; Bond albedo < 0.08; CO2-band depth 96 ppm; likelihood ratio 7.4; plausible 0.3–1.0 bar CO2-rich family), and the main caveats (single-planet inference, retrieval/systematics sensitivity, weaker night-side constraints, and composition/circulation/cloud degeneracies). Claims are appropriately hedged (
